Package hw2

Class HotelReservation

java.lang.Object
hw2.Reservation
hw2.HotelReservation
Direct Known Subclasses:
BnBReservation
public class HotelReservation extends Reservation
Represents a hotel reservation, extending Reservation class. HotelReservation encapsulates properties such as the hotel, room type, and number of nights. It calculates the cost of the reservation based on the price per night and the total number of nights.
Since:
13/03/2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Panagiotis Tsembekis

      name - The name associated with the reservation.
      hotel - The hotel for the reservation.

    • getCost

      public int getCost()
      Calculates and returns the cost associated with this hotel reservation. The cost is calculated based on the price per night and the total number of nights.
      Specified by:
      getCost in class Reservation
      Returns:
      The cost of the hotel reservation.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares this hotel reservation to another object for equality. Two hotel reservations are considered equal if they have the same name, hotel, room type, number of nights, and total cost.
      Specified by:
      equals in class Reservation
      Parameters:
      o - The object to compare with this hotel reservation.
      Returns:
      true if the objects are considered equal, false otherwise.
